name: Improved Critical
description:
Critical/Fumble effect generator.
 Usage: **Critical**
 `!critical [percent]` where percent is an optional number between 1 and 100. If omitted random percent will be rolled
 **Fumble**
 `!fumble [percent]` where percent is an optional number between 1 and 100. If omitted random percent will be rolled

 [Details](https://github.com/Roll20/roll20-api-scripts/blob/master/ImprovedCritical/READ.md)
